p: The word ‘ Rasayana ( Rasa + ayana)’ refers to nutrition and its transportation in the body for attaining excellent Rasadi Dhatus; which leads to gain longevity, freedom from disorders, optimum strength of physique and sense organs [ 21, C.S.Chi. 1:1/4-8]. Rasayana promotes nutrition by explicitly enriching the nutritional value of Rasa by enhancing Agni, i.e. digestion, metabolism, and absorption (by Srotashodhana). Consequently, any medication that improves Rasa’s consistency would enhance the health of all body tissues.
